named-query.name: findSeriesByName
named-query.query: select s from SeriesEntity s where lower(s.name) = lower(:name)

named-query.name: getSeriesSetsCountByIds
named-query.query: select new Map(s.id as id, (select count(1) from SetEntity se where se.series.id = s.id) as cnt) from SeriesEntity s where s.id in (:ids)

named-query.name: getAllSeries
named-query.query: select s from SeriesEntity s order by s.name

named-query.name: findSetByNumber
named-query.query: select s from SetEntity s where lower(s.number) = lower(:number)

named-query.name: getSetCountBySeries
named-query.query: select count(1) from SetEntity s where s.series.id = :seriesId

named-query.name: findColorByName
named-query.query: select c from ColorEntity c where lower(c.name) = lower(:name)
